definition: to concoct/to invent/to fabricate/to produce/to process/processing and curing (Chinese medicine)
to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating
lit. to follow the recipe (idiom)/fig. to follow a set pattern

sentences.english: The same goes for other coddling behaviors, like pestering him to eat his vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 對於其它的溺愛也如法炮製，如勸他自己喫菜。

sentences.english: We do have a remarkable talent for cooking up crazy get-rich schemes.
sentences.chinese: 在炮製瘋狂發財計劃方面，我們的確有過人才華。

sentences.english: Wrestlers do it all the time to make a weight class.
sentences.chinese: 摔交選手爲了達到某個重量級別總是如法炮製。

sentences.english: The lists just can't be arbitrary.
sentences.chinese: 這個清單時不能武斷炮製的。

sentences.english: The possible mechanism of gastrodin formation during the crude process was also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文還討論了天麻素在炮製過程中形成的可能機理。

sentences.english: Processing methods have certain influence on chemical constituents in Poria cocos herbs.
sentences.chinese: 炮製加工對茯苓飲片的化學成分有一定的影響。

sentences.english: Trust companies have churned out such products this year.
sentences.chinese: 信託公司今年炮製了大量這類產品。

sentences.english: Results showed that content of volatile oil was decreased and its quality changed after processing.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，炮製後揮發油含量減少，質量發生變化。

sentences.english: Objective:Overview the development of modern preparation of Eucommia ulmoides Oliver.
sentences.chinese: 目的對杜仲現代炮製的研究進展作一綜述。

sentences.english: The research indicated artillery methods and the content of polysaccharide has direct relations.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明炮製方法與多糖含量的多少有直接的關係。

sentences.english: It has also been confirmed that myristicin tends to decrease in varying degrees after the nutmeg has been processed.
sentences.chinese: 同時證明肉豆蔻醚在炮製後有不同程度的降低。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo optimize the technologies of processing in Heshouwu braised.
sentences.chinese: 目的優化黑豆汁燉何首烏炮製工藝。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo provide the basis of the technological standardization of Rubia cordifolia L.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲茜草炭炮製工藝的優化提供依據。

sentences.english: Then India would follow suit, as would Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 印度和巴基斯坦也會如法炮製。

sentences.english: Results The IR spectrometry of Ophicalcitum was different before and after calcination.
sentences.chinese: 結果炮製前後的花蕊石紅外光譜圖有明顯差異。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of different preparing methods on the quality of Follum Eriobotryae.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解不同炮製方法的枇杷葉炮製品質量。

definition: to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
to choose for some purpose/to select and use
to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven
